EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM What's new in Spring Data.TYFR
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Replay: What’s new in Spring Data
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Oliver Gierke from the Spring Team for a look at What’s new in Spring Data. Here's a quick recap of the session:
- Overview of new features released in Fowler and Gosling release trains - Recent additions and improvements in Spring Data Commons - Latest and greatest features of individual store modules including JPA and MongoDB
Session replay link & slides: http://spring.io/blog/2016/02/18/webinar-replay-what-s-new-in-spring-data-gosling-fowler <[[http://spring.io/blog/2016/02/18/webinar-replay-what-s-new-in-spring-data-gosling-fowler]]>
Interested in more? Check out the Spring Guides online for how to use the latest Spring project releases and techniques as recommended by the Spring team. Also, check out the O’Reilly book on Spring Data <[[http://shop.oreilly.com/product/0636920024767.do]]> written by several members of the Spring Team!
Looking for Spring or Cloud Foundry training and certification? Sign up for hands-on Pivotal Academy <[[https://pivotal.io/academy]]> classes today to build, master and certify your technical proficiency around the latest Spring technologies from Pivotal.
Stay in touch with Pivotal’s Spring Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/springcentral]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/news-events]]>!
Thanks, The Spring Team at Pivotal
